jobs.title: Head of Growth
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We’re looking for a head of growth to work directly with our CEO to define experiments, drive execution, and unlock new levers for growth.

Serif is an applied AI company building the first truly functional personal agent. Our mission isn't to create just another AI employee, but to comprehensively manage our users’ lives so they finally have peace of mind. If we’re successful, there should be substantially less stress in the world and 100x more successful one person businesses.

What we expect from you

  • Own growth end to end. From TOFU experiments to optimizing sign up/onboarding flows to designing viral surfaces.

  • You should have experience with UGC, influencer marketing, performance, SEO. If you don’t have experience, you should be able to become an expert in days.

  • Your product intuition should be strong enough to influence roadmap and build viral surfaces (read up on how Calendly grows)

  • You must love talking to customers. In the first week you will call 10 customers and tell me what they care about. Bonus if you do this before you even join.

You will be well resourced

  • You will have complete ownership over experiments you want to run. And we have the budget for you to run some crazy things.

  • You will also have 1 dedicated engineer to implement your experiments.

  • If you think it’s the best strategy, you will have budget to hire up to 5 interns or design/marketing/SEO agencies.

  • You will work and report directly to the CEO. Skip politics completely and test what you want to test.

Who you look like

  • If I ask your friends about you, they should tell me you somehow always get what you want.

  • Hands on experience growing consumer/prosumer apps in the past year. The game is very different now than it was three years ago.

  • You’re smart, move fast, and need to win.

The only hard requirement is working in person in SF.

jobs.title: Founding Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
At Serif, we're building the first truly functional personal agent powered by applied AI. As a Founding Engineer, you'll work directly with our core team to establish the technical foundation of our product. You'll tackle complex AI integration challenges and help create systems that manage users' lives comprehensively, reducing stress and enabling more successful one-person businesses.

Some of the challenging technical problems you'll help solve include:

  • Building reliable agent systems that can handle complex, multi-step tasks

  • Designing robust integration frameworks for connecting with various digital services

  • Creating seamless user experiences that build trust in autonomous AI actions

  • Implementing sophisticated context management and memory systems that sync across all surfaces

We're assembling a world-class engineering team to transform how people interact with AI. If you're passionate about pushing the boundaries of AI agents and creating technology that meaningfully improves people's lives, we want to talk to you.

Responsibilities

  • Design and implement core infrastructure for our AI agent platform

  • Build robust integration systems for connecting with external services and APIs

  • Develop reliable agent execution frameworks that can handle complex tasks

  • Create intuitive interfaces for users to interact with their personal agent

  • Optimize for performance, reliability, and security across our systems

  • Collaborate with AI researchers to implement cutting-edge agent capabilities

  • Help establish engineering best practices and technical direction

You might be a good fit if you have:

  • 3~5 years of experience at hypergrowth startup

  • Strong software engineering experience with modern web technologies

  • Experience building and scaling backend systems

  • Background in working with AI/ML systems or integrating with AI APIs

  • Comfort with ambiguity and rapidly evolving technical requirements

  • Passion for creating AI systems that genuinely help people

Strong candidates may also have:

  • Experience building autonomous agent systems or AI applications

  • Background in natural language processing or large language models

  • Knowledge of modern AI frameworks and infrastructure

  • History of working in early-stage startups and wearing multiple hats

  • Experience building and scaling backend systems to support real-world production workloads
